# PIPELINE AUTOGENERATED on 10/04/2011 03:19:15 AM
# ================================================================

pipeline create Camera c
pipeline set c gui_feedback 
pipeline set c id c
pipeline set c index 0
pipeline set c use_thread false
pipeline set c x 14
pipeline set c y 26

pipeline create GrayScale g
pipeline set g gui_feedback 
pipeline set g id g
pipeline set g use_thread false
pipeline set g x 240
pipeline set g y 226

pipeline create Threshold t
pipeline set t adaptive false
pipeline set t block_size 21
pipeline set t gui_feedback 
pipeline set t id t
pipeline set t mode mean
pipeline set t threshold 50
pipeline set t type binary
pipeline set t use_thread false
pipeline set t x 17
pipeline set t y 359

pipeline create BlobFinder b
pipeline set b gui_feedback 
pipeline set b id b
pipeline set b max_size 2500
pipeline set b min_size 4
pipeline set b use_thread false
pipeline set b x 241
pipeline set b y 341

pipeline create GreedyBlobTracker tr
pipeline set tr gui_feedback 
pipeline set tr id tr
pipeline set tr max_age 10
pipeline set tr max_distance 0.100000
pipeline set tr max_rotation_speed 46
pipeline set tr min_age 3
pipeline set tr use_thread false
pipeline set tr x 25
pipeline set tr y 515

pipeline create Tuio tu
pipeline set tu gui_feedback 
pipeline set tu id tu
pipeline set tu ip 192.168.1.100
pipeline set tu port 3333
pipeline set tu sendsize true
pipeline set tu use_thread false
pipeline set tu x 261
pipeline set tu y 530

pipeline create ImageDisplay d1
pipeline set d1 gui_feedback 
pipeline set d1 id d1
pipeline set d1 name Movid0
pipeline set d1 use_thread false
pipeline set d1 x 243
pipeline set d1 y 670

pipeline create ImageDisplay d2
pipeline set d2 gui_feedback 
pipeline set d2 id d2
pipeline set d2 name Movid1
pipeline set d2 use_thread false
pipeline set d2 x 21
pipeline set d2 y 664

pipeline create Justify justify
pipeline set justify dx 0.000000
pipeline set justify gui_feedback 
pipeline set justify id justify
pipeline set justify ma 1.000000
pipeline set justify mb 0.000000
pipeline set justify mc 0.000000
pipeline set justify md 1.000000
pipeline set justify use_thread false
pipeline set justify x 229
pipeline set justify y 55



pipeline connect c 0 g 0
pipeline connect g 0 t 0 
pipeline connect t 0 b 0 
pipeline connect t 0 d1 0 
pipeline connect b 0 d2 0 
pipeline connect b 1 tr 0 
pipeline connect tr 0 justify 0 
pipeline connect justify 0 tu 0
